content: The Earth Wolf hits very hard, but winds up a lot of its moves, giving you a chance to dodge out of the way before they hit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Wolf_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Wolf Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Wolf Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Earth Wolf hits very hard, but winds up a lot of its moves, giving you a chance to dodge out of the way before they hit.
